divs: Sighting Detailsit was the same night it was spotted in the st louis, mo area and southern illinois. i was outside in front of my house having a smoke and i felt it above me. i looked up and it was a huge black triangle that moved very slow. there were no lights and a very low (right above the tree tops) and a almost vibration sound. I knew it was a ufo. it was heading south. i was scared and i ran in the house.
Summary: Huge, low, slow, low humm, no lights.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Pesotum
This sighting has never been favorited.
